chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
si: sorted_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface

Goal:
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' client_cache_keys_correct

Premises:
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : Net.name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst
client_cache_keys_correct_clientCache_complete : forall net : network, client_cache_keys_correct net -> client_cache_complete net
raft_net_invariant' : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), raft_net_invariant_init P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request' P -> raft_net_invariant_timeout' P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries' P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote' P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' P -> raft_net_invariant_do_leader' P -> raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' P -> raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> raft_net_invariant_reboot' P -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
client_cache_keys_correct = fun net : network => forall h : Net.name, a_equiv clientId_eq_dec (clientCache_to_ks (clientCache (nwState net h))) (log_to_ks' (rev (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h)))) []) : network -> Prop
state_machine_correct_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_correct net where ?orig_base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- BaseParams] ?one_node_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- OneNodeParams ?orig_base_params] ?raft_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- RaftParams ?orig...
failure_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.reboot := reboot |} : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), FailureParams multi_params Arguments failure_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_matching = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => log_matching_hosts net /\ log_matching_nw net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_matching {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
state_machine_safety = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => state_machine_safety_host net /\ state_machine_safety_nw net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments state_machine_safety {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
maxIndex_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => maxIndex_lastApplied net /\ maxIndex_commitIndex net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments maxIndex_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_init = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => P step_async_init : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_init {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
state_machine_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => state_machine_log net /\ client_cache_correct net /\ client_cache_complete net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments state_machine_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_sorted_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, sorted (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => logs_sorted_host net /\ logs_sorted_nw net /\ packets_gt_prevIndex net /\ packets_ge_prevTerm net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
init_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) => mkRaft_data 0 None None [] 0 0 init [] [] false [] Follower [] [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data Arguments init_handlers {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
state_machine_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, stateMachine (nwState net h) = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log (rev (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h)))))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments state_machine_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
applyEntries_spec_ind : applyEntries ?h ?st ?es = (?os, ?st') -> forall P : raft_data -> Prop, (forall (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), P (RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output ?st d) cc)) -> P ?st' where ?es : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- list entry] ?h : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi :...
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type]
logs_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c -> sorted entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
client_cache_complete = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h))) -> exists (id : nat) (o : output), getLastId (nwState net h) (eClient e) = Some (id, o) /\ eId e <= id : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments client_cache_complete {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
a_equiv : (forall k k' : ?K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (?K * ?V) -> list (?K * ?V) -> Prop where ?K : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type] ?V : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type]
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type]
raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eIndex e > pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_invariant_handle_message' : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries' P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote' P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
Record state_machine_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_correct_interface { state_machine_correct_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_correct net } Arguments state_machine_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_matching_interface { log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net } Arguments log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record state_machine_safety_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_safety_interface { state_machine_safety_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_safety net } Arguments state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record max_index_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_max_index_sanity_interface { max_index_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net } Arguments max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
